selected_quotes: More children in England are entering care than in the early 1990s, and they are staying there for longer
1 in 30 children will enter care at some point throughout the course of their childhood
Are more children children going into care than ever before?
Interesting article looking at changing numbers of children in care over time in UK.
Are more children going into care? Hard evidence report using #admindata by our Louise McGrath-Lone
